name: Sazei Town
description:
Sazei Town - Farming Simulator

The game centers around a young farmer, Demi and her wife Ruby, a beekeeper. They live on a quaint farm in the countryside near the town of Sazei. The game takes place in the season of Spring. Demi spends her days caring for her crops and spending time with Ruby. The player assumes the role of Demi, they will be in charge of growing and selling crops to the townspeople. The player will check for orders everyday i.e. what crops have been requested, how many and by when must they be delivered. The player can choose which jobs they would like to undertake and produce the appropriate crops by buying the correct seeds and tending to them.

Use the WASD keys to move. Click to select tools and then point and click on the grid square to complete an action. Click menu items to discover orders, keep track of orders, shop and exit.  Harvested crops must be placed in the appropriate jute bags on the top left.Feedback
